column3: “knocked me out after severe stress, it was a life saver and tastes amazing!”
“Procured some outdoor Valley Ghash. Even for outdoor this is a pretty good strain; good genetics. The high is very euphoric and light but at the same time heavy.”
“It's pretty strong tasting with a very intense high.”
“Strain is beautiful. It smells like no other weed I have smelt. Deffinite buy if you can get your hands on it. Only have seen it once but man it’s great. Nice relaxing feel. Great taste.”
“Picked up a batch from Green Cross in Silt, CO and was thoroughly impressed with the quality, very good strain, had me all sorts of medicated!!”
“Goes down smooth but knocks you out. Tastes great”
